name: Mogic
description: A game about Captain L. in space getting gold. 3rd person, spaceship and exciting!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,Windows 8,Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 610 Big Video Memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i9 7980XE Memory: 128 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 2080 TI DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 12288 GB available space
